string.text: A weighty folder with documents, financial statements for the current month, which Major Zhurov is waiting at his place from his subordinate, Sergeant Lozhkin.

A package given by a stalker for delivery to his acquaintance. The contents are unknown. Oddly enough, it has no protection at all against tampering by outsiders.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]CHARACTERISTICS:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] personal belongings
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high value
This storage device contains a small part of the information Kirillov managed to save.
The contents of this case are unknown, presumably, information about ISG activities.
It looks like an ordinary voice recorder, which can be found everywhere. But this one has been upgraded by Senior Lieutenant Kirillov, it reacts to sound and makes a recording.
